title: Loyal Employee
description: As a baker employed at ShadowHunter's Bakery at Calle della Scuola dei Fornai, I maintain a strong professional relationship (StrengthScore: 131.25) built on moderate trust (TrustScore: 15.50). Our connection is primarily defined by our employer-employee dynamic, with ShadowHunter providing me stable employment while I contribute my maritime-honed precision to his commercial enterprise.
